DOC.brief_summary: Most old adult want stay home long possible . To reach aim important maintain mobility self-care ability . However , many old adult risk lose ability , inactive lifestyle . In study , homecare professional learn motivate client active daily physical activity . Examples activity wash dressing , household chore go walk . The primary aim exploratory study evaluate implementation 'Stay Active Home ' program ( process evaluation ) . The secondary aim get insight potential effectiveness program regard several primary secondary outcome measure ( effect evaluation ) . The tertiary aim test feasibility propose study design .
DOC.brief_title: Stimulating Engagement Daily Physical Activities Among Older Adults Receiving Homecare Services
DOC.criteria: ≥65 year Communitydwelling Indication homecare ≥10 hour sedentary behaviour/day ( measure LASA vragenlijst questionnaire ) Written informed consent Terminal Serious cognitive psychological problem Not able speak Dutch
